cast.name: 爱丽丝·罗伯茨 Alice Roberts

trans_title: 挖掘英国 第十一季
introduction: Professor Alice Roberts returns in a fascinating new series of the BBC’s flagship archaeology programme, Digging for Britain.Joining archaeologists on the most exciting digs in the UK, Alice and the Digging for Britain team record their extraordinary discoveries as they happen.Highlights in this series include a spectacular Anglo-Saxon gold pendant found near Winchester, a Roman Dodecahedron that leaves experts confounded, a Norman panic room, built to keep out the Welsh, a Roman Altar stone shedding new light on the origin of Leicester Cathedral, the largest Neolithic axe heads ever found in the British Isles, and Henry VIII’s lost palace of Elsyng.[Episodes]The Roman Emperor’s BathhouseAnglo-Saxon Gold and Rebellious NunsA Norman Panic Room and a Mesolithic Fish TrapA Roman Mystery and Waterloo’s Disappearing Dead3,000-Year-Old Shoes and Giant AxeheadsForgotten Fortresses and Lost Villages[Credits]Presenter: Alice RobertsReporter (Episode 1 & 4): Onyeka NubiaReporter (Episode 1 & 6): Cat JarmanReporter (Episode 3): Stuart PriorProduction Manager: Verity QuinnSeries Producer: Dominic OzanneEditor: Christy ScoltockExecutive Producer: Rory WheelerExecutive Producer: Edward HartProduction Company: Rare TV
chinese_title: 挖掘英国 第十一季
